title: sponge服务器1.12暮色森林error问题
author: e_mirai
txt_content:
错误日志https://paste.ubuntu.com/p/2vYK4VdN9d/已经出现过几次了，但不是必现的。暮色的版本是官方最新版3.10.1013
出现这些错误之后就开始无限刷error，无法连接
看起来是高塔建筑的方块和高塔巨人有问题，请问该怎么解决。

replies.author: Phwan
replies.txt_content:
可能是卡导致服务器蹦了呢？
试试这个吧
服务器暮色森林卡的解决办法
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-790979-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: zc7644525
replies.txt_content:
找到最后两行改成这样
performance {
    # Amount of canopy coverage, from 0.0 on up.  Lower numbers improve chunk generation speed at the cost of a thinner forest.
    D:CanopyCoverage=1.0
    # Chance that a chunk in the Twilight Forest will contain a twilight oak tree.  Higher numbers reduce the number of trees, increasing performance.
    I:TwilightOakChance=200
